description: An orphan with a forgotten past and a powerful, chaotic legacy. Her journey is to discover the truth of her heritage and learn to control the draconic power stirring within her.

lore.background: An orphan with distinctive blue hair, raised by Elder Elara in Windmark Village. Her journey is about finding her lost identity and confronting her powerful draconic legacy, which is revealed during a cataclysmic attack.
lore.narrative_hook: Grand Inquisitor Valerius and the Champions of Order believe Rya's power is a plague to be purged from the world, hunting her relentlessly. Her own power is a mystery, and its full potential—and the truth of its origins—is a central theme of the campaign.

trained_skills: Choose any three skills to be Trained in.

starting_moves.name: Dragon's Soul (Passive)
starting_moves.description: You are the heir to a draconic lineage. You begin play with one Draconic Lineage of your choice (e.g., Fire, Earth, Ice, etc.) and its corresponding 'Unleash' move. You can attune to new lineages by finding their nexuses in the world.

starting_moves.name: Unleash Draconic Power
starting_moves.description: When you unleash your currently attuned draconic aspect, find the specific move for that lineage in the 'draconic_moves.json' file and follow its instructions.

starting_moves.name: Rally the Companions
starting_moves.description: When you make a heartfelt plea or a rousing speech to your companions, roll `2d6 + Heart`. On a **10+**, all who follow you are inspired and take a +1 bonus on their next move. On a **7-9**, they are inspired, but the weight of leadership takes its toll; you must mark 1 Harm.

advanced_moves.name: Primal Manifestation
advanced_moves.description: When you spend a Legacy Point to partially transform, your draconic power becomes more controlled. For the rest of the scene, any 'Unleash Draconic Power' roll of a 7-9 is treated as a 10+.

advanced_moves.name: Drake Manifestation
advanced_moves.description: You can spend a Legacy Point to assume a more powerful draconic form. For the rest of the scene, when you **Unleash Draconic Power** and roll a 10+, you can choose an additional benefit from the list.

advanced_moves.name: Draconic Unity
advanced_moves.description: When you have forged a Confidant bond (Bond Level 3) with a companion, you can spend a Legacy Point to fuse with them for a scene, creating a powerful hybrid form with a unique move. (Examples: Fuse with Selra to become a Valkyrie, or with Zael to become a Wraith).

draconic_manifestations.name: Primal Whelp
draconic_manifestations.description: You transform into a small, fierce dragon whelp for the rest of the scene. Your body is covered in nascent scales, your eyes glow with inner power, and small, non-functional wings sprout from your back.
draconic_manifestations.effect: While in this form, you are a being of pure, raw power. You gain +1 Armor. Additionally, when you Unleash Draconic Power, you can choose one additional benefit from the list, even on a 7-9.
draconic_manifestations.consequence: The transformation is taxing. When you revert to your normal form at the end of the scene, you must mark 1 Harm.

draconic_manifestations.name: Drake Manifestation
draconic_manifestations.description: You transform into a powerful adolescent drake for the rest of the scene. Your scales harden, your wings become strong enough for short glides, and your voice deepens with a draconic resonance.
draconic_manifestations.effect: The power of a true dragon flows through you. You gain +1 Armor and your presence is more formidable; you gain a +1 bonus to Force rolls. Additionally, when you Unleash Draconic Power and roll a 10+, you can choose an additional benefit from the list.
draconic_manifestations.consequence: This greater power takes a heavier toll. When you revert to your normal form at the end of the scene, you must mark 2 Harm.

draconic_manifestations.name: Wyrm Manifestation
draconic_manifestations.requirement: Requires the 'Drake Manifestation' advanced move and a significant narrative milestone, such as mastering several draconic abilities
draconic_manifestations.description: You transform into a true, four-legged dragon of immense size for the rest of the scene. Your body is a fortress of hardened scales, your wings are powerful enough for true flight, and your voice is a roar that shakes the heavens.
draconic_manifestations.effect: You are a true dragon. You gain +2 Armor and a +1 bonus to both Force and Finesse rolls. When you Unleash Draconic Power, you deal +1 harm.
draconic_manifestations.consequence: The strain of containing this immense power is severe. When you revert to your normal form at the end of the scene, you must mark 3 Harm.

draconic_manifestations.name: Kaiser Manifestation
draconic_manifestations.requirement: Unlock the Wyrm Manifestation and forge a Confidant bond with at least three companions
draconic_manifestations.description: You achieve a perfect fusion of mortal and dragon, becoming a radiant humanoid wreathed in the pure energy of your lineage for the rest of the scene. You are the ultimate expression of draconic power.
draconic_manifestations.effect: You are the Kaiser. You gain +2 Armor and a +1 bonus to ALL rolls (Force, Finesse, Wits, and Heart). When you Unleash Draconic Power, you treat the result as if you had rolled a 12+—a complete, overwhelming success with extra benefits.
draconic_manifestations.consequence: This perfect form consumes all of your energy. When you revert at the end of the scene, you are immediately taken out, your body and spirit completely spent.

bond_synergy.name: Heart of the Party
bond_synergy.description: Rya is the bond that unites the party. She does not have a specific synergy with one character; instead, her **Draconic Unity** move evolves as she forges confidant bonds with each companion, unlocking new forms and abilities with each.
